channel.title: Moparscape Problems!
channel.description:
Ok,I have a few questoins.
#1-I downloaded Moparscape, extraced all files, and ect. I can log on and talk, change my in-game menu (backpack,prayer,spells,ect) but i can't move, then after about a minute or so, i get kicked off. Anyone know what I've done wrong or anything i can do to fix this problem? (this didn't happen at first, i was able to play for about an hour before this happened.)
#2-Also what is the best IP to use so I can fine other players? It gets boring with no one to talk to.
[br][size=1]Posted on: April 15, 2007, 03:38:45 PM[/size][hr]Anyone? if you need more information to help me out here ask away.

@rukan85 wrote:

[quote=“Deigon, post:3, topic:80718”]Well the lag could be a possiblity, I’m running on dial-up

And no, by “IP” I meant the IP and the log in screen, the one I have been useing is “127.0.0.1”

And i have Hamachi downloaded, but not exactly sure of what I’m suppose to do with it.[/quote] u r beginner and have no idea wht ur doing play on servers 1st get some knowledge come back and we’ll be happy to teach u

item.title: Moparscape Problems!
item.dc:creator: @Zzz_O_zzZ Zzz O zzZ
item.description:
@Zzz_O_zzZ wrote:

[quote=“Deigon, post:1, topic:80718”]Ok,I have a few questoins.

#1-I downloaded Moparscape, extraced all files, and ect. I can log on and talk, change my in-game menu (backpack,prayer,spells,ect) but i can’t move, then after about a minute or so, i get kicked off. Anyone know what I’ve done wrong or anything i can do to fix this problem? (this didn’t happen at first, i was able to play for about an hour before this happened.)

#2-Also what is the best IP to use so I can fine other players? It gets boring with no one to talk to.

[br][size=1]Posted on: April 15, 2007, 03:38:45 PM[/size][hr]Anyone? if you need more information to help me out here ask away.[/quote]

#1, Perhaps Your Source Requires You To Type ::rules Before You Can Move Anywhere. Or The Other Possiblity Is, Your Just Lagg Crazy.

#2, The Best I.P. To Use? Not Sure What You Mean Exactly But, I Would Preffer Hamachi Because It’s Easier To Set Up. (Is This What You Mean?)
